text.name: Green Knight
text.text: Who are you!? How did you get in here!?

text.name: Green Knight
text.text: Oh, the door was unlocked? Well you shouldn't just walk into random houses anyway.

text.name: Green Knight
text.text: Wow, you found my lost jewel. I can't take it yet so you hold onto it for now.

notMetReqText.name: Green Knight
notMetReqText.text: Why are you still here? Go away.
